1232190.name: SSTR Demo
1232190.description:
SSTR is a single player escape-room style puzzle game set aboard Horizon. A colony ship adrift in the darkness of space, under the watchful eye of Sister. Awaken into madness and explore the horrors of Horizon’s past.

We've designed this demo to test out a couple of mechanics present within the game. Try it out, solve the puzzles, and have some fun :)
If you enjoyed it, share it with your friends!
1232190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
